entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow or rain beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
